languages.text: "Ситуация непростая, но... Леди Моллес-Секандас действовала в интересах Империума. На ее плечи легла забота о семейном деле, и она не могла предаваться скорби многие циклы". {n}Девушка расправляет плечи и с достоинством изрекает:{/n} "Брак для знати — это союз двух слуг Его, исполненный долга перед Империумом. Если один из супругов долгое время не может исполнять свои обязанности, то и смысла в браке нет. Если бы вы могли узаконить такое суждение, это бы помогло разрешить ситуацию".

"This is a complicated situation, but... Lady Molles-Secundas was acting in the Imperium's interests. She had shouldered the duty of care for the family business, and was in no position to wallow in her grief for cycles upon cycles." {n}Cassia throws back her shoulders and says in a dignified voice,{/n} "A marriage between people of noble birth is a union of two servants of the Emperor. Duty toward the Imperium is at the heart of that union. If there comes a long period of time when one of the spouses is unable to fulfil their obligations, the marriage loses its meaning. If you could codify this understanding in law, that would help resolve this situation."
languages.original_text: "Ситуация непростая, но... Леди Моллес-Секандас действовала в интересах Империума. На ее плечи легла забота о семейном деле, и она не могла предаваться скорби многие циклы". {n}Девушка расправляет плечи и с достоинством изрекает:{/n} "Брак для знати — это союз двух слуг Его, исполненный долга перед Империумом. She had shouldered the duty of care for the family business, and was in no position to wallow in her grief for cycles upon cycles." {n}The young woman throws back her shoulders and says in a dignified voice:{/n} "A marriage between people of noble birth is a union of two servants of the Emperor. Duty toward the Imperium is at the heart of that union. If there comes a long period of time when one of the spouses is unable to fulfil their obligations, the marriage loses its meaning. If you could make this opinion into law, that would help resolve this situation."

languages.text: "Das verkompliziert die Lage, aber ... Lady Molles-Secundas hat im Interesse des Imperiums gehandelt. Sie hat es auf sich genommen, das Familiengeschäft zu leiten und konnte viele Zyklen lang nicht um ihren Verlust trauern." {n}Cassia wirft sich in die Brust und verkündet würdevoll: {/n} "Eine Ehe zwischen Personen von edler Geburt ist die Union zweier Diener des Imperators. Die Pflicht gegenüber dem Imperium steht im Zentrum dieser Union. Kann einer der Ehepartner seinen Pflichten über einen längeren Zeitraum nicht nachkommen, verliert die Ehe ihre Bedeutung. Könnte man dieses Verständnis gesetzlich kodifizieren, ließe sich diese Situation lösen."
languages.original_text: "This is a complicated situation, but... Lady Molles-Secundas was acting in the Imperium's interests. She had shouldered the duty of care for the family business, and was in no position to wallow in her grief for cycles upon cycles." {n}Cassia throws back her shoulders and says in a dignified voice,{/n} "A marriage between people of noble birth is a union of two servants of the Emperor. Duty toward the Imperium is at the heart of that union. If there comes a long period of time when one of the spouses is unable to fulfil their obligations, the marriage loses its meaning. If you could codify this understanding in law, that would help resolve this situation."

traits.locale_text: "Das verkompliziert die Lage, aber ... Lady Molles-Secundas hat im Interesse des Imperiums gehandelt. Sie hat es auf sich genommen, das Familiengeschäft zu leiten und konnte viele Zyklen lang nicht um ihren Verlust trauern." {n}Cassia wirft sich in die Brust und verkündet würdevoll: {/n} "Eine Ehe zwischen Personen von edler Geburt ist die Union zweier Diener des Imperators. Die Pflicht gegenüber dem Imperium steht im Zentrum dieser Union. Kann einer der Ehepartner seinen Pflichten über einen längeren Zeitraum nicht nachkommen, verliert die Ehe ihre Bedeutung. Könnte man dieses Verständnis gesetzlich kodifizieren, ließe sich diese Situation lösen."

languages.text: « C'est une situation compliquée, mais... Dame Molles-Secundas a agi dans l'intérêt de l'Imperium. Elle s'est efforcée de faire tourner l'affaire familiale, et elle ne pouvait pas se permettre de se complaire dans son chagrin plusieurs cycles durant. » {n}Cassia redresse les épaules et s'exprime d'une voix empreinte de dignité :{/n} « Un mariage entre individus de noble extraction n'est autre que l'union de deux serviteurs de l'Empereur. Une union axée sur le devoir envers l'Imperium. Quand l'un des deux époux se trouve dans l'incapacité prolongée de remplir ses obligations, le pacte conjugal perd tout son sens. Si vous pouviez codifier cette disposition dans la loi, cela faciliterait la résolution des affaires de ce genre. »
languages.original_text: "This is a complicated situation, but... Lady Molles-Secundas was acting in the Imperium's interests. She had shouldered the duty of care for the family business, and was in no position to wallow in her grief for cycles upon cycles." {n}Cassia throws back her shoulders and says in a dignified voice,{/n} "A marriage between people of noble birth is a union of two servants of the Emperor. Duty toward the Imperium is at the heart of that union. If there comes a long period of time when one of the spouses is unable to fulfil their obligations, the marriage loses its meaning. If you could codify this understanding in law, that would help resolve this situation."

Elle s'est efforcée de faire tourner l'affaire familiale, et elle ne pouvait pas se permettre de se complaire dans son chagrin plusieurs cycles durant. » {n}Cassia redresse les épaules et s'exprime d'une voix empreinte de dignité :{/n} « Un mariage entre individus de noble extraction n'est autre que l'union de deux serviteurs de l'Empereur. Une union axée sur le devoir envers l'Imperium. Quand l'un des deux époux se trouve dans l'incapacité prolongée de remplir ses obligations, le pacte conjugal perd tout son sens. Si vous pouviez codifier cette disposition dans la loi, cela faciliterait la résolution des affaires de ce genre. »

languages.text: “案件的情况确实很复杂，不过……莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人所做的一切，都与帝国的利益相符。她的处境不允许她恣意沉浸在悲痛之中，她必须肩负起照顾家族事业的重任。”{n}卡西娅挺直了身体，以充满威严的声音开了口。{/n}“贵族之间的婚姻，是帝皇两位忠仆的结合，而这种联盟的核心，在于对帝国的责任。如果很长一段时间之内，夫妻之间任意一方无法履行职责，那婚姻本身也便失去了意义。如果你能把这样的理解写入律法之中，那应该会有助于解决当下的问题。”
languages.original_text: "This is a complicated situation, but... Lady Molles-Secundas was acting in the Imperium's interests. She had shouldered the duty of care for the family business, and was in no position to wallow in her grief for cycles upon cycles." {n}Cassia throws back her shoulders and says in a dignified voice,{/n} "A marriage between people of noble birth is a union of two servants of the Emperor. Duty toward the Imperium is at the heart of that union. If there comes a long period of time when one of the spouses is unable to fulfil their obligations, the marriage loses its meaning. If you could codify this understanding in law, that would help resolve this situation."

traits.locale_text: “案件的情况确实很复杂，不过……莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人所做的一切，都与帝国的利益相符。她的处境不允许她恣意沉浸在悲痛之中，她必须肩负起照顾家族事业的重任。”{n}卡西娅挺直了身体，以充满威严的声音开了口。{/n}“贵族之间的婚姻，是帝皇两位忠仆的结合，而这种联盟的核心，在于对帝国的责任。如果很长一段时间之内，夫妻之间任意一方无法履行职责，那婚姻本身也便失去了意义。如果你能把这样的理解写入律法之中，那应该会有助于解决当下的问题。”

languages.text: «Esta es una situación complicada, pero... lady Molles-Secundas actuó con los intereses del Imperium en mente. Ha cargado con el deber de velar por el negocio familiar y no ha estado en posición de llorar a su marido en todos estos ciclos». {n}Cassia se yergue por completo y continúa con voz solemne:{/n} «Un matrimonio entre personas de noble cuna es una unión entre dos sirvientes del Emperador. En el corazón de dicha unión se encuentra el deber hacia el Imperium. Si se produce un lapso de tiempo prolongado en el que uno de los cónyuges es incapaz de cumplir con sus obligaciones, el matrimonio pierde su significado. Si pudiera codificar esto en la ley, sería muy sencillo resolver la situación».
languages.original_text: "This is a complicated situation, but... Lady Molles-Secundas was acting in the Imperium's interests. She had shouldered the duty of care for the family business, and was in no position to wallow in her grief for cycles upon cycles." {n}Cassia throws back her shoulders and says in a dignified voice,{/n} "A marriage between people of noble birth is a union of two servants of the Emperor. Duty toward the Imperium is at the heart of that union. If there comes a long period of time when one of the spouses is unable to fulfil their obligations, the marriage loses its meaning. If you could codify this understanding in law, that would help resolve this situation."

traits.locale_text: «Esta es una situación complicada, pero... lady Molles-Secundas actuó con los intereses del Imperium en mente. Ha cargado con el deber de velar por el negocio familiar y no ha estado en posición de llorar a su marido en todos estos ciclos». {n}Cassia se yergue por completo y continúa con voz solemne:{/n} «Un matrimonio entre personas de noble cuna es una unión entre dos sirvientes del Emperador. En el corazón de dicha unión se encuentra el deber hacia el Imperium. Si se produce un lapso de tiempo prolongado en el que uno de los cónyuges es incapaz de cumplir con sus obligaciones, el matrimonio pierde su significado. Si pudiera codificar esto en la ley, sería muy sencillo resolver la situación».

languages.text: 「これは複雑な状況ですが…レディ・モレス・セクンダスは帝国の利益のために行動していました。彼女は家業の責任を引き受け、何周期も喪に服して過ごす余裕などなかったのです」{n}カシアは背筋を伸ばし、威厳のある声で言った。{/n}「高貴な生まれの者同士の結婚とは、すなわち皇帝に仕える二人の臣下の結びつきです。その絆の中心にあるのは、帝国への義務です。もしどちらかの配偶者が長きにわたりその義務を果たせないのであれば、その結婚は意味を失います。この理解を法として成文化していただければ、本件の解決に役立つはずです」
languages.original_text: "This is a complicated situation, but... Lady Molles-Secundas was acting in the Imperium's interests. She had shouldered the duty of care for the family business, and was in no position to wallow in her grief for cycles upon cycles." {n}Cassia throws back her shoulders and says in a dignified voice,{/n} "A marriage between people of noble birth is a union of two servants of the Emperor. Duty toward the Imperium is at the heart of that union. If there comes a long period of time when one of the spouses is unable to fulfil their obligations, the marriage loses its meaning. If you could codify this understanding in law, that would help resolve this situation."

traits.locale_text: 「これは複雑な状況ですが…レディ・モレス・セクンダスは帝国の利益のために行動していました。彼女は家業の責任を引き受け、何周期も喪に服して過ごす余裕などなかったのです」{n}カシアは背筋を伸ばし、威厳のある声で言った。{/n}「高貴な生まれの者同士の結婚とは、すなわち皇帝に仕える二人の臣下の結びつきです。その絆の中心にあるのは、帝国への義務です。もしどちらかの配偶者が長きにわたりその義務を果たせないのであれば、その結婚は意味を失います。この理解を法として成文化していただければ、本件の解決に役立つはずです」

languages.text: "Ziyadesiyle karmaşık bir durum... Ancak Leydi Molles-Secundas, İmparatorluk'un lehine hareket etmiştir. Aile işletmesinin idaresini üstlendiğinden, döngüler boyu yas tutacak vakit bulamamıştır." {n}Cassia; göğsünü gere gere, vakur bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Soylu aileler arasında yapılmış bir evlilik, İmparator'un iki hizmetkârının birleşimi niteliğindedir. Bu birleşimin temelinde yatansa İmparatorluk'a hizmettir. Eşlerden birinin vazifesini uzun süre yerine getiremeyeceği hâller, evlilik akdini geçersiz kılmak için yeterlidir. Bu anlayışın kanunlara kodlanması hâlinde ortada bir sorun kalmayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "This is a complicated situation, but... Lady Molles-Secundas was acting in the Imperium's interests. She had shouldered the duty of care for the family business, and was in no position to wallow in her grief for cycles upon cycles." {n}Cassia throws back her shoulders and says in a dignified voice,{/n} "A marriage between people of noble birth is a union of two servants of the Emperor. Duty toward the Imperium is at the heart of that union. If there comes a long period of time when one of the spouses is unable to fulfil their obligations, the marriage loses its meaning. If you could codify this understanding in law, that would help resolve this situation."

Bu anlayışın kanunlara kodlanması hâlinde ortada bir sorun kalmayacaktır."
